verses.content: Aw LALPA, keini mi pe loin, keini mi pe loin, I hming chu ropuina pe lem rawh, I ngilneina le i thutak leiin.
Iengdinga hnam tinin, “Khâwlai am an Pathien kha teh?” an ti am a na?
Kan Pathien chu vânah a um sih a, A nuom taphawt a thaw a nih.
An milimhai chu tangka le rângkachak an na, Mihriem kutsuok an nih.
Bauhai an nei a, an ṭawng thei si nawh, Mithai an nei a, an hmu thei si nawh.
Nahai an nei a, an hriet thei si nawh, Hnârhai an nei a, rim an hriet thei si nawh.
Kuthai an nei a, iengkhawm an tâwk thei si nawh. Kehai an nei a, an lâwn thei si nawh a, An hnukin an ṭawng thei si nawh.
Chuong siemtuhai chu chuong ang bawk chun um an ta, Anih, chuong ringtu taphawthai chu.
Aw Israelhai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.
Aw Aron sûnghai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.
LALPA ṭituhai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.
LALPA chun a mi hriet zing a, mal mi sâwm a tih, Israel sûnghai chu mal sâwm a ta, Aron sûnghai chu mal sâwm a tih.
LALPA ṭituhai chu mal sâwm a ta, A lien a chînin.
LALPA chun sukpung deu deu raw se cheu, Nangni le in nauhai leh.
LALPA chun mal sâwm raw se cheu, Ama chu hnuoi le vân siemtu a nih.
Vânhai khi LALPA vânhai a na, Leihnuoi ruok hi chu mihriem nauhai kuomah a pêk a nih.
Mithihai chun LALPA chu an inpâk nawh a, Hmun retaka zu fehai hrim hrim chun an inpâk bawk nawh.
Eini ruok chun LALPA chu inpâk tâng ei tih, Tuta inthawka kumkhaw- tluongin. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
